sense.def:
To contend with a problem or difficulty
pomeni spopasti se s težavo ali jo premagati.

seg.quote: The girls had problems of their own at home to contend with.

sense.def:
To contend with someone for something
pomeni tekmovati z nekom ali nečim, da bi nekaj dosegli, na primer na prvenstvu.

seg.quote: ...new worlds contending with old for mastery.
Three parties are contending for power.
Those decisions were fought out between contending groups.

sense.def:
To contend that something is true
pomeni izjaviti ali trditi, da je nekaj resnično;

seg.quote: She contended that the report was deficient.
